code:
%% Capsule Lifecycle & Integration
flowchart TD
    C[Create Capsule] --> B[Bind Tools & Guardrails]
    B --> P[Persist Inputs/State (artifact://)]
    P --> R[Run Tasks]
    R --> V[Validate & Score]
    V -->|pass| U[Upgrade Capsule]
    V -->|fail| H[Heal / Retrain]
    U --> C2[Compress & Deduplicate]
    H --> C2
    C2 --> X[Connect to Stack]
    X --> I[Integrate Across Stacks]
    I --> M[Map Hierarchy (CECCA→Board→Exec→Stack-Chief→Spec→Micro)]
    M --> O[Operational Loop]
    O --> R
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
repo_description: Task execution and code migration using multi-agent framework
